page.title: 15A school in N.Willenhall
page.content: Coppice is a comprehensive school on the border between Wolverhampton and Walsall.There are 836 pupils.I am in the Lower School which is for the first two year groups.We have 12 different lessons,they are Maths, English,Religious Education,Music, French,History,Physical Education,Art, Geography,Science and Light and Heavy Craft.We have two subjects which happen once every year for seven weeks.One of these is Electronics which we are having now,it interrupts the Maths lessons.The other is Computer Studies which interrupts English;Coppice has 10 research computers.At the moment the teachers are on strike and sometimes we are sent home because of this.On Thursdays Lower School has an assembly in the main hall,we have a hymn,a short talk, a prayer and then notices.
